## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process">Process</a> IMPLICIT&#95;DEF instructions and make sure there is one implicit&#95;def for each use.

Add isUndef marker to implicit&#95;def defs and their uses.

Definition at line 29 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/processimplicitdefs-cpp">ProcessImplicitDefs.cpp</a>.

### getAnalysisUsage() {#a4b69980472727d3c85984e8b2cf02f99}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - Subclasses that override getAnalysisUsage must call this.

For MachineFunctionPasses, calling AU.preservesCFG() indicates that the pass does not modify the MachineBasicBlock CFG.
